channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road needs sweeping of huge amount of fallen leaves, 5th December
item.description:
Huge amount of fallen leaves on right side of road as you drive down Churchill Drive past Churchill Gardens to Haywards Road. In danger of clogging up drains at bottom of road, causing an overflow of rain water. Will need to give at least 24 hour notice to move all parked cars so road is clear to enable road to be swept completely.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Churchill Drive, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole on pavement broken, 5th December
item.description:
The manhole on the pavement has completely collapsed, dangerous for school children
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely deep potholes that have reopened, 5th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold

item.title: All street lamps out., 5th December
item.description:
Entire street and surrounding alleyways in Lee Close, Cheltenham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Lee Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on previously repaired pothole destroyed car tyre, 5th December
item.description:
Heading from air balloon roundabout towards Cheltenham, the section of road past National Star college has a number of old pit holes previously repaired. The tarmac on one of these is damaged revealing a new (old) pothole directly in car tyre line. It's destroyed my car tyre sidewall and cost me a new tyre.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large crack appearing with multiple potholes, 4th December
item.description:
Large crack with multiple wider sections. North side of bridge. . Has been getting progressively worse over multiple months. A similar situation on the other side resulted in the bridge closure for a year while repair / stabilisation plans were put in place. Please investigate and repair so the same does not happen on the other side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 18” pothole on Leckhampton Hill near turn into Ullenwood Court, 4th December
item.description:
Driving towards Cheltenham, I heard a bang and realised I had a puncture. I pulled off the road and called AA. Went back to photograph pothole. Front nearside tyre completely flat with big tear.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Going into Salamanca road from Imjin Road the potholes start all the way up to the no 26, 4th December
item.description:
I have reported this before and you say they are not needing repair, I beg you to look once again, they are breaking up everywhere your tyres need to go and getting bigger by the day and more off them it is like an obsticle course and those already done are beginning to look iffy, the whole road needs replacing, cars parked on all corners and makes it difficult to avoid those holes in the middle and everywhere just have another look please and see what can be repaired
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Salamanca Road, Oakley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Partially fallen tree, 4th December
item.description:
Rotten tree partially fallen across the road held up only by adjacent tree on the opposite side of the road. In its current position it would obstruct a lorry but not a car but would represent a hazard to anything passing underneath it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
